thread.section_title: American Frame americanframe.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Frame americanframe.com | www.americanframe.com
thread.title: Kath
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Kath

author: Kath
title: Kath
text: I have ordered 4 or 5 frames now and they are all beautiful. It is very convenient to find the right frame and put in the exact measurements for a custom fit. They are well packed for shipping without damage. My only suggestion would be to make the R measurement easier to understand. I had to look all through the website to confirm what I thought it was by process of elimination.
